SEARCH
Package main

Class HWSystem

java.lang.Object
main.HWSystem
public class HWSystem extends Object
Represents the hardware system that manages ports and connected devices. This class provides functionalities to add, remove, and control various devices such as sensors, displays, motor drivers, and wireless communication modules.

    Constructs an HWSystem with specified maximum device limits.

  • Constructor Details

    • HWSystem

      public HWSystem(int maxSensors, int maxDisplays, int maxWireless, int maxMotorDrivers)
      Constructs an HWSystem with specified maximum device limits.
      Parameters:
      maxSensors - Maximum number of sensors allowed.
      maxDisplays - Maximum number of displays allowed.
      maxWireless - Maximum number of wireless devices allowed.
      maxMotorDrivers - Maximum number of motor drivers allowed.

  • Method Details

    • addPort

      public void addPort(Protocol protocol, String logDir)
      Adds a new port to the system.
      Parameters:
      protocol - The protocol associated with the port.
      logDir - Directory to store log files for the port.

    • addDev

      public boolean addDev(String devType, int portId, int devId)
      Adds a device to a specified port if it is available.
      Parameters:
      devType - The type of device to be added.
      portId - The port ID where the device should be connected.
      devId - The unique device ID.
      Returns:
      true if the device is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • rmDev

      public boolean rmDev(int portId)
      Removes a device from a port.
      Parameters:
      portId - The ID of the port where the device is connected.
      Returns:
      true if the device is successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • turnON

      public void turnON(int portId)
      Turns ON a device connected to a specific port.
      Parameters:
      portId - The port ID where the device is connected.

    • turnOFF

      public void turnOFF(int portId)
      Turns OFF a device connected to a specific port.
      Parameters:
      portId - The port ID where the device is connected.

    • readSensor

      public void readSensor(int devId)

      devId - The ID of the display device.

      Sets the motor speed of a motor driver device.
      Parameters:
